title: “Does this channel have more juice in it?” YouTuber J.J. McCullough on a “sustainable” life as a news creator
description: When J.J. McCullough first started making YouTube videos in 2015, he was 31, and worried he was too old to break through on an already saturated platform. McCullough had lost his job as a political commentator on the conservative Canadian TV channel Sun News Network when the station abruptly shut down. “I bought a little...
